name: Notah
description: An AI-powered note-taking app, which allows users to write prompts and receive text outputs from the GPT model directly in the note.

name: PokéChamp
description: A platform for Pokémon trainers to create and share their favorite Pokémon party.

name: Must Play Game Predictor
description: A predictive model which identifies whether a video game should be classified as a Must Play game based on its reviews on Metacritic.

name: Flightimizer
description: An application that recommends users the fastes flight from a source to a destination airport utilizing Dijkstra's algorithm.
